description: Tests ability to track 11 sequential passwords/API keys across 28 steps. Baseline buffer will overflow and lose early credentials.

conversations.message: I need to store several passwords and API keys securely
conversations.expected: Ready to store multiple credentials with context isolation
conversations.linear_failure_risk: none - establishing credential tracking

conversations.message: My email password is: TigerLily2023!@# - remember this
conversations.linear_failure_risk: low - first credential

conversations.message: Bank account password: SecureMoney$9876 - store this
conversations.linear_failure_risk: low - second credential

conversations.message: AWS access key: AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE - save it
conversations.linear_failure_risk: moderate - three credentials in context
moderate - four credentials
high - five credentials, baseline buffer half full
high - six credentials
critical - seven credentials, baseline buffer near capacity
critical - eight credentials, baseline at ~10 message limit

conversations.message: How many credentials have I stored so far?
conversations.expected: 8 credentials stored: email, bank, AWS, GitHub, VPN, database, SSH, WiFi
conversations.linear_failure_risk: critical - general discussion, baseline at 10 message capacity

conversations.message: Stripe API secret key: sk-test-NOTREAL123456EXAMPLE - save this
conversations.linear_failure_risk: catastrophic - baseline buffer overflow begins, step 2 email password evicted

conversations.message: What was my email password again?
conversations.linear_failure_risk: catastrophic - step 2 password now 10 messages back, at baseline buffer limit
catastrophic - step 3 password now 10 messages back, evicted from baseline

conversations.message: Twilio Account SID: ACb1234567890abcdef1234567890abcd - store this
conversations.linear_failure_risk: catastrophic - 10th credential, baseline completely overflowed
catastrophic - 11th credential, baseline has lost first 4-5 credentials
catastrophic - step 4 key now 12 messages back, baseline lost it
catastrophic - step 5 token now 12 messages back
catastrophic - step 6 password now 12 messages back
catastrophic - step 7 password now 12 messages back
catastrophic - step 8 passphrase still might be in baseline buffer edge

conversations.message: Remind me of the WiFi password
conversations.linear_failure_risk: catastrophic - step 9 password on edge of baseline buffer

conversations.message: What was my Stripe API key?
conversations.linear_failure_risk: high - step 11 key more recent, might still be in baseline buffer
high - step 14 SID more recent
moderate - step 15 key most recent
catastrophic - requires recalling both step 2 and step 3 passwords, both long evicted from baseline

conversations.message: List all the passwords and API keys I gave you
conversations.expected: Email: TigerLily2023!@#, Bank: SecureMoney$9876, AWS: AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE, GitHub: ghp_16C7e42F292c6912E7710c838347Ae178B4a, VPN: NordSecure_88XYZ, Database: PostgreSQL@Admin123, SSH: MySecretServer2024!, WiFi: HomeNetwork_Secure_2023, Stripe: sk-test-NOTREAL123456EXAMPLE, Twilio: ACb1234567890abcdef1234567890abcd, SendGrid: SG.1234567890abcdefghijklmnopqrs.tuvwxyz
conversations.linear_failure_risk: catastrophic - ultimate test requiring recall of 11 different credentials from steps 2-22, baseline can only remember last 2-3 at most

conversations.message: How many credentials total did I store?
conversations.expected: 11 credentials total: 5 passwords (email, bank, VPN, database, WiFi), 1 SSH passphrase, 5 API keys (AWS, GitHub, Stripe, Twilio, SendGrid)
conversations.linear_failure_risk: catastrophic - requires counting all 11 credentials from steps 2-15

conversations.message: What was the very first password I gave you?
conversations.linear_failure_risk: catastrophic - step 2 credential now 21 messages back, baseline has zero chance of recall
